text: The pasta carbonara at Bella Vita was absolutely divine, creamy and perfectly seasoned.
Our waiter was attentive and friendly, making the dining experience really enjoyable.
The ambiance was cozy with soft lighting and comfortable seating.
However, the grilled salmon tasted bland and lacked seasoning.
Prices were reasonable for the portion sizes we received.
The service was incredibly slow and our server seemed completely disinterested.
Even the house wine tasted like it had been open for days.
